main event: A witness observed six glowing objects in the sky over Cincinnati, Ohio, on 26 November 1954, appearing to play 'Follow the Leader'.
interesting points: The objects had blinking lights and each seemed to have a tail., All six objects were observed moving from north to west before disappearing., The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes., The witness was walking on Burnet Ave near the corner of Jefferson Ave when they spotted the objects., The witness speculated the objects could be city lights, despite their non-typical behavior.
sighted object: six glowing objects in the sky
witness description: The witness was a chief engineer from Cincinnati, who reported seeing the objects.
